unnormalised: Arrey bhai, aanink ek fintech app? Aasha asa hi Rs. 10 chaivaaleak diunk *matich* mhozo Aadhar no. *portun* magchina!
normalised: Arrey bhau, ani ek fintech app? Mhaka aasha asa hi ek rupiyo dha chaya valyak dilear mhozo Aadhar no. asterisk punha asterisk magona!
text: Arrey bhai, aani ek fintech app? Mhaka aasha asa hi Rs. 10 chaivaleak poixe diunk matyek mhaje Aadhar no. asterisk *pune* asterisk magchonam mhonn!
